Sentencas: Sr2Mg(Mo0.8Nb0.2)O-6_(delta) (SMMNb) was investigated as potential anode material of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) for direct oxidation of methane.
Titulo: Study of Sr2Mg(Mo0.8Nb0.2)O6_δ as anode material for solid oxide fuel cells using hydrocarbons as fuel

Sentencas: The compound was prepared by solid state reaction, followed by annealing under reducing atmosphere of 10% H-2/N-2 at 900 degrees C.
Titulo: Study of Sr2Mg(Mo0.8Nb0.2)O6_δ as anode material for solid oxide fuel cells using hydrocarbons as fuel

Sentencas: The structural and morphological properties of fresh and reduced material were characterized by XRD, XPS and SEM.
Titulo: Study of Sr2Mg(Mo0.8Nb0.2)O6_δ as anode material for solid oxide fuel cells using hydrocarbons as fuel

Sentencas: Additionally, catalytic properties towards oxidation of methane, electrical properties in reducing atmosphere as well as thermal and chemical compatibility with common SOFC electrolytes were investigated.
Titulo: Study of Sr2Mg(Mo0.8Nb0.2)O6_δ as anode material for solid oxide fuel cells using hydrocarbons as fuel

Sentencas: These results reveal a double perovskite single phase in the fresh and reduced compound and, after reduction, a change in the niobium valence was observed.
Titulo: Study of Sr2Mg(Mo0.8Nb0.2)O6_δ as anode material for solid oxide fuel cells using hydrocarbons as fuel

Sentencas: SMMNb shows a good activity for methane partial oxidation as well as combined reforming reaction.
Titulo: Study of Sr2Mg(Mo0.8Nb0.2)O6_δ as anode material for solid oxide fuel cells using hydrocarbons as fuel

Sentencas: The material presents a semiconductor behaviour with n-type electronic conduction and an excellent thermal compatibility with SOFC electrolytes such as SDC, GDC and LSGM, based on similarity of values of TEC.
Titulo: Study of Sr2Mg(Mo0.8Nb0.2)O6_δ as anode material for solid oxide fuel cells using hydrocarbons as fuel

Sentencas: However, this material reacts with zirconia-based electrolytes (YSZ and ScSZ).
Titulo: Study of Sr2Mg(Mo0.8Nb0.2)O6_δ as anode material for solid oxide fuel cells using hydrocarbons as fuel

Sentencas: Although, a low electrochemical activity for H-2 and CH4 oxidation was found, SMMNb demonstrates high tolerance to carbon deposition when the anode is exposed to methane.
Titulo: Study of Sr2Mg(Mo0.8Nb0.2)O6_δ as anode material for solid oxide fuel cells using hydrocarbons as fuel
